Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Quite frankly, I don't miss standing in the box or standing on the field playing

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been strong and determined all my life about many things I've wanted

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in a business where no one cares about anything except how well your last collection sold

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think about my fame very much

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't allow myself to have tremendous fear

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fun seeing my label on someone's behind - I like that

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm crazy, and I don't pretend to be anything else

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't always want my opinion known. What little privacy I have left I'd like to maintain

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't dwell on success. Maybe that's one reason I'm successful

Quote.Author: Calvin Klein
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I don't have a proper perspective on my fame; if I did, I don't think I'd like it

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Manhood coerced into sensitivity is no manhood at all

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I'm just a natural warrior

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaving sex to the feminists is like letting your dog vacation at the taxidermist

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Anti-religious sneers are a hallmark of perpetual adolescents

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman simply is, but a man must become

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: A war still rages over the legacy of the 1960s

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Rule of art: Cant kills creativity!

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: If civilization had been left in female hands we would still be living in grass huts

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: When anything goes, it's women who lose

Quote.Author: Camille Paglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Pursuit and seduction are the essence of sexuality. It's part of the sizzle

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a man who looks like a bad boy but knows how to treat a woman like a queen

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very skinny, braces; so I never thought I would be a model

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: Your body is a machine. Learn the right way to take care of it

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to train as much as I can, as much as my schedule allows it

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: Victoria's Secret is like a big family

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm crazy about jewelry; swimwear and jewelry

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am healthy and happy

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I get skinnier if I'm very busy

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm usually bikini-ready all year round

Quote.Author: Candice Swanepoel
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to live my life naked, with all my little naked kids naked in the garden

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: When I see a dolphin, I know it's just as smart as I am

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: You can tell by the kindness of a dog how a human should be

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: The stars are matter, we're matter, but it doesn't matter

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of modern rock and roll is a product of guilt

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in playing, not working

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in a Mobile Home - I've never had a house, except once; I rented a log cabin

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no neighbours other than animals and Joshua Trees

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Dylan impresses me about as much as... well, I was gonna say a slug but I like slugs

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: An audience can really lift you right up off the stage

Quote.Author: Captain Beefheart
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to be a different fish, jump out of school

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: This modeling thing, it's pretty easy, but actually it's also really tough

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: Embrace your weirdness!

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I hyperventilate quite a lot

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to do a shoot with snakes - big snakes, like pythons

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be goofy. I like to make people laugh. I like to have a good time as much as possible

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: Victoria's Secret is really about celebrating women and what they stand for: the strength

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a Disney Channel star! I wanted to be Hannah Montana

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to beatbox and have been doing it before I even knew what it was

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: In school, I was Martha in 'Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?' I loved that

Quote.Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: Psoriasis is an autoimmune disease, and I'm sensitive

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's cool people love to hate me

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a workaholic

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to really duck down and make myself smaller than I already am

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I personally don't like to rehearse so much. I really sort of trust my instinct

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very musical family from my Scottish roots

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't get me wrong: I would not say no to an Oscar!

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: In my own country, I play light comedies and funny parts

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great to play somebody's wife, but not all the time. There's so many other stories to tell

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't say I'm having trouble with my husband or that I have a stubborn child

Quote.Author: Carice van Houten
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know how to play evil

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: When I don't know what to wear, I wear black lace

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I have good legs, so I prefer my skirt lengths and my high heels. It's like my uniform

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always independent. No boss

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Each morning, you dress to become a different woman. Fashion helps

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Pregnancy is something that I always love. It's about hope and the future and a new baby

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I love black lingerie and white shoes, and I love knives

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like Botox. It makes a very strange forehead

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I always love to push myself, because I am not so self-confident

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: The Russians are very much more up and down than the French

Quote.Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I love ballet because you can see how beautiful the body is

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about timing

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to free your mind to do things you wouldn't think of doing. Don't ever say no

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether I'm 40, 50 or 60, I'm going to be as physically strong as I am able

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Our message of the day is service does not need a title

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I work with the Carl Lewis Foundation focusing on youth from high school down

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: When I run - you can see my record - I run to win

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: People have always thought of me as being something, but I'm just a human being like everyone else

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't intend to stay around any longer than I feel I can be No. 1

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a fast learner. I may not run as fast as I used to, but I think I still learn as fast

Quote.Author: Carl Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy my life, I love track, I'm set for life financially

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry is an echo, asking a shadow to dance

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a good loser is to learn how to win

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Love your neighbor as yourself; but don't take down the fence

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing happens unless first we dream

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the gentle bush dig its root deep and spread upward to split one boulder

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the greatest necessities in America is to discover creative solitude

Quote.Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned you can't trust the judgment of good friends

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: The backbone of surprise is fusing speed with secrecy

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: War is the continuation of politics by other means

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: It is even better to act quickly and err than to hesitate until the time of action is past

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Many intelligence reports in war are contradictory; even more are false, and most are uncertain

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: War is regarded as nothing but the continuation of state policy with other means

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: To secure peace is to prepare for war

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: War is not an exercise of the will directed at an inanimate matter

Quote.Author: Carl von Clausewitz
Quote.QuoteValue: War is the domain of physical exertion and suffering

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Musically, I always wanted to experiment

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Be yourself. And every person is unique

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something unnatural about losing a sibling when they're young

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to do one thing at a time and do it to the best of my ability

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe everything falls into place as it's supposed to

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have to just be myself. Anything else, I'm not happy, and it comes out musically

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Eccentricity has never been discouraged in our family

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of a perfectionist about my songwriting. If I don't mean it, I don't think it's any good

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a few ditty hits

Quote.Author: Carlene Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Lots of girls marry at 16 in Tennessee

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: The time is right for electric cars - in fact the time is critical

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: The role of leadership is to transform the complex situation into small pieces and prioritize them

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is important, it's an important dimension in the car. It's not the only one

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: Profit is the most global aspect of a business, and it is cross-functional

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't believe what I say. Believe what I do

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: As the CEO, I have to take care of the short term, mid term and the long term

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: Business is tough; you need tough guys

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be easier to make money in other sectors, but since I was a kid, I liked cars

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't build your character by doing what everybody else is doing

Quote.Author: Carlos Ghosn
Quote.QuoteValue: Electric cars are not going to take the market by storm, but it's going to be a gradual improvement

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: There's never one sunrise the same or one sunset the same

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: Just as we have two eyes and two feet, duality is part of life

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: Some songs are just like tattoos for your brain... you hear them and they're affixed to you

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: Your wrinkles either show that you're nasty, cranky, and senile, or that you're always smiling

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody sooner or later has to drop the luggage and the baggage of illusions

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: I knuckle down with my demons, and with my weaknesses

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: The Devil is like a strainer that separates the mud from the gold

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay in your heart

Quote.Author: Carlos Santana
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no person that love cannot heal; there is no soul that love cannot save

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: You should have more time for you during all of your life - not when you're 65 and retired

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest things in life are not materials

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: I love baseball. And American Football, too. But not rugby

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are in business, you are not enjoying. You are working

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was very young, maybe 12 years, I began to make investments

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: There are people who are good for letters and others that are good for numbers

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have business with any politicians

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't take anything when we pass away, and we need to do with the sense of responsibility

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: I studied engineering in the national university, the Universidad Autonoma, in San Ildefonso

Quote.Author: Carlos Slim
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, when I was very young, maybe 12 years, I began to make investments

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: If a decision-making process is flawed and dysfunctional, decisions will go awry

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: People who don't fit the mold are treated differently than those who do

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: You take unacceptable risk, you have to be prepared to face the consequence

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not be afraid to make decisions, do not be afraid to make mistakes

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I dive in, I dive in all the way

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are not all single-issue voters

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never thought in terms of 'men do this' and 'women do that.'

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership comes in small acts as well as bold strokes

Quote.Author: Carly Fiorina
Quote.QuoteValue: A merger is hard to pull off under any circumstances. It's harder when everybody is against you

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: You usually can't tell what's inspiring until you look back on it

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: I took it to heart that in order to be a good person, you never said anything mean about anybody

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: You're lucky you had that when you were 20. I sure didn't. I was overweight, and I had acne

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: As a singer I tried on all these hats, these voices, these clothes, and eventually out came me

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: I had this terrible stammer, so I couldn't really speak properly until I was 16 or 17

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: We need role models who are going to break the mold

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: My scar is beautiful. It looks like an arrow

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to show off my scar proudly and not be afraid of it

Quote.Author: Carly Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, but the year I lived in France I started to write songs

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a risk

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: It's too late for me to get married before I'm famous. You never know people's intentions

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: People look at me like I'm on my way out of the game. I'm just getting started

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Any decision I make is the biggest decision of my life

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make the lightest shoe possible, but still be able to perform at the same time

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to get on the court

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I think going to college for that one year was probable the best thing I have ever done

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everybody has their own unique style

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't palm a basketball

Quote.Author: Carmelo Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Who wouldn't want to go back home to play?

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into working out. My philosophy: No pain, no pain

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be your authentic self because there's nothing sexier or more beautiful than that

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: My kind of gay is like the late-breaking-lesbian kind of gay

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought I was going to have children. I just thought after 45, that was it

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel I've always got to keep my stand-up because I never want to lose it

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a huge influence on me

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: I cried when I turned 34 for no other reason than 34 sounded old to me at the time

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: As a writer, the worst thing you can do is work in an environment of fear of rejection

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was the kind of guy who'd always say 'Throw out any subject and I got a joke on it.'

Quote.Author: Carol Leifer
Quote.QuoteValue: My stand-up act is very clean

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents always told me I could be anything I wanted to be

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: My life has been a tapestry of rich and royal hue, an everlasting vision of the ever changing view

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a downside to having one of the biggest-selling albums ever

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: Sensitive, humbug. Everybody thinks I'm sensitive. Wait until they hear my new album

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a songwriter first

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't want to be an artist

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: I only wanted to be a songwriter. I never wanted to be a singer. And I never wanted to be famous

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: My creativity is an entity unto its own

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: I write heavily under the influence of James Taylor

Quote.Author: Carole King
Quote.QuoteValue: My one area of vulnerability was I didn't know how to have a healthy relationship with a man

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion has always been a repetition of ideas, but what makes it new is the way you put it together

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is to please your eye. Shapes and proportions are for your intellect

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: You never expect anything when you are 20 because you think that you'll never get older

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to say that I'm perfect. I do have fashion crises

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the simplest things are the most profound

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: You feel very romantic when you're in a ball gown. Everyone should wear one once in a while

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Attention to detail is of utmost importance when you want to look good

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Luxury will be always around, no matter what happens in the world

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Intuition is a strong feminine quality

Quote.Author: Carolina Herrera
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep in shape: if you look good, you will feel confident

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't dwell in your past but move forward, look forward. That's it

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I win I'm doing something right

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: I never give up. Doesn't matter what the score is

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: On grass, it can be the small things that decide a match

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: In Denmark lots of people come up to me for autographs

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: You feel better about yourself when you do something with yourself. You also feel more confident

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: I just go out there and fight for every point, and then we see how far I can go

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents just always taught me to be reasonable

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: I do my best, and that's all I can do

Quote.Author: Caroline Wozniacki
Quote.QuoteValue: I like Twitter a lot. It is a great way to get the fans knowing another side of you

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Instant gratification takes too long

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Resentment is like drinking poison and waiting for the other person to die

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no point at which you can say, 'Well, I'm successful now. I might as well take a nap.'

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I was street smart, but unfortunately the street was Rodeo Drive

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't find any true closeness in Hollywood, because everybody does the fake closeness so well

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: As you get older, the pickings get slimmer, but the people don't

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be a victim

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a very discreet human when it comes to other people

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is negotiable. Whether or not the negotiation is easy is another thing

Quote.Author: Carrie Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very sane about how crazy I am

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Throw caution to the wind and just do it

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: My very first magazine cover was the National Enquirer

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to know you have support. Last night I got a marriage proposal. I just laughed

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a part of SKECHERS is exciting. It is such a hip company with a great attitude and image

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not ever much of anything going on in my head

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to dance around the house when I'm getting ready. It gets my day going

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes a girl's gotta have some chocolate!

Quote.Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no attention span. I get bored so fast

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm a celebrity. I'm just a guy from east Texas who loves cars and airplanes

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a massive motor in a tiny, lightweight car

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: Porsche and BMW drivers are arrogant

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: What I wanted to do was build an automobile

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a lot of fun driving race cars, but it wasn't my No. 1 priority

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: Every morning I wake up with new ideas

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I never made a damn dime until I started doing what I wanted

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I love horsepower

Quote.Author: Carroll Shelby
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a good run. I've built a lot of things that work and a lot of things that didn't work

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very motivated person. I don't need extra motivation

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate losing, and I'm gonna do whatever it takes to be the best at whatever it is I'm doing

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: You just control what you can control and just hopefully go win games and keep getting better

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I know we're not going undefeated. I know I'm not going to throw a touchdown every game

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every down is important

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get nervous

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy creating relationships with my teammates, my friends, and I genuinely care about people

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: I view every day just as an opportunity

Quote.Author: Carson Wentz
Quote.QuoteValue: Timing and accuracy is really what matters at the end of the day
